verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> be-'ar-Vot in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av; of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> yar-Den by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

צַו֮ <S%H6680><s%> tzav Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu that they give לַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim, unto the Levites מִֽנַּחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> min-na-cha-Lat of the inheritance אֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <S%H272><s%> 'a-chuz-za-Tam of their possession עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-Sha-vet; to dwell in וּמִגְרָ֗שׁ <S%H4054><s%> u-mig-Rash, suburbs לֶֽעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> le-'a-Rim for the cities סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vo-tei-Hem, round about תִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu and ye shall give לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim. [also] unto the Levites

וְהָי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become הֶֽעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim And the cities לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לָשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-Sha-vet; shall they have to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <S%H4054><s%> u-mig-re-shei-Hem, and the suburbs יִהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu shall be for לִבְהֶמְתָּם֙ <S%H929><s%> liv-hem-Tam of them shall be for their cattle וְלִרְכֻשָׁ֔ם <S%H7399><s%> ve-lir-chu-Sham, and for their goods וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> u-le-Chol and for all חַיָּתָֽם׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-ya-Tam. and for all their beasts

וּמִגְרְשֵׁי֙ <S%H4054><s%> u-mig-re-Shei And the suburbs הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, of the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim; unto the Levites מִקִּ֤יר <S%H7023><s%> mik-Kir [shall reach] from the wall הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city וָח֔וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> va-Chu-tzah, and outward אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וּמַדֹּתֶ֞ם <S%H4058><s%> u-mad-do-Tem And ye shall measure מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz from without לָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir, the city אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side קֵ֣דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah on the east אַלְפַּ֪יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֟ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side נֶגֶב֩ <S%H5045><s%> ne-Gev and on the south אַלְפַּ֨יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּאַמָּ֜ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֣ם׀ <S%H3220><s%> yam and on the west אַלְפַּ֣יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> pe-'At side צָפ֛וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon and on the north אַלְפַּ֥יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand בָּאַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits וְהָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ve-ha-'Ir and the city בַּתָּ֑וֶךְ <S%H8432><s%> bat-Ta-vech; [shall be] in the midst זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall become לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מִגְרְשֵׁ֖י <S%H4054><s%> mig-re-Shei this shall be to them the suburbs הֶעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim. of the cities

וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, And among the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim, unto the Levites אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- [there shall be] six עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <S%H4733><s%> ham-mik-Lat, for refuge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנ֔וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu, which ye shall appoint לָנֻ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> la-Nus that he may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah for הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach; for the manslayer וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> va-'a-lei-Hem addition תִּתְּנ֔וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu, thither and to them ye shall add אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Ta-yim and two עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir. cities

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, [So] all the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim, to the Levites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im [shall be] forty וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Neh and eight עִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir; cities אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> 'et-Hen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <S%H4054><s%> mig-re-shei-Hen. them [shall ye give] with their suburbs

וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> ve-he-'a-Rim, And the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu which ye shall give מֵאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> me-'a-chuz-Zat [shall be] of the possession בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et הָרַב֙ <S%H7227><s%> ha-Rav from [them that have] many תַּרְבּ֔וּ <S%H7235><s%> tar-Bu, ye shall give many וּמֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> u-me-'Et הַמְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> ham-'At but from [them that have] few תַּמְעִ֑יטוּ <S%H4591><s%> tam-'I-tu; ye shall give few אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, every one כְּפִ֤י <S%H6310><s%> ke-Fi according נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To to his inheritance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִנְחָ֔לוּ <S%H5157><s%> yin-Cha-lu, which he inheriteth יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten shall give מֵעָרָ֖יו <S%H5892><s%> me-'a-Rav of his cities לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim. unto the Levites פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; to כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki When אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> 'oe-Rim unto them When ye be come over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וְהִקְרִיתֶ֤ם <S%H7136><s%> ve-hik-ri-Tem Then ye shall appoint לָכֶם֙ la-Chem עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim, you cities עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei to be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> mik-Lat of refuge תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וְנָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> ve-Nas may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there רֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> ro-Tze-ach, for you that the slayer מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> mak-keh- thither which killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <S%H7684><s%> bish-ga-Gah. at unawares

וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem הֶעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim And they shall be unto you cities לְמִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> le-mik-Lat for refuge מִגֹּאֵ֑ל <S%H1350><s%> mig-go-'El; from the avenger וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo will not יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut die הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach, that the manslayer עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until עָמְד֛וֹ <S%H5975><s%> a-me-Do not until he stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> lam-mish-Pat. in judgment

וְהֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> ve-he-'a-Rim And of these cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּתֵּ֑נוּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-Te-nu; which ye shall give שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- six עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei cities מִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> mik-Lat shall ye have for refuge תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah become לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> 'et שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three הֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, cities תִּתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu Ye shall give מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver on this side לַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> lai-yar-Den, Jordan וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh and three הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, cities תִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu shall ye give בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei [which] shall be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <S%H4733><s%> mik-Lat of refuge תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah. become

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei [both] for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְלַגֵּ֤ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger and for the stranger וְלַתּוֹשָׁב֙ <S%H8453><s%> ve-lat-to-Shav and for the sojourner בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham, among תִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah become שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- These six הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh These לְמִקְלָ֑ט <S%H4733><s%> le-mik-Lat; shall be a refuge לָנ֣וּס <S%H5127><s%> la-Nus may flee שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah, there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- anyone מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> mak-keh- them that every one that killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <S%H7684><s%> bish-ga-Gah. unawares

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if בִּכְלִ֨י <S%H3627><s%> bich-Li him with an instrument בַרְזֶ֧ל׀ <S%H1270><s%> var-Zel of iron הִכָּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ka-hu And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mot so that he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> ro-Tze-ach he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach. the murderer

וְאִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im If בְּאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> be-'E-ven a stone יָד֩ <S%H3027><s%> yad him with throwing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יָמ֨וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut wherewith he may die בָּ֥הּ bah הִכָּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ka-hu And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mot and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> ro-Tze-ach he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach. the murderer

א֡וֹ <S%H176><s%> o Or בִּכְלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> bich-Li weapon עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz- of wood יָד֩ <S%H3027><s%> yad him with an hand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יָמ֨וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut wherewith he may die בּ֥וֹ bo הִכָּ֛הוּ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ka-hu Or [if] he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mot and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <S%H7523><s%> ro-Tze-ach he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach. the murderer
